description: Port Vale move level on points with Bradford in the League Two automatic promotion places with a 2-0 win at Vale Park.
title: Port Vale 2-0 Bradford City
title_page: Port Vale 2-0 Bradford City - BBC Sport
maintext:
Port Vale have lost just one of their last 10 home league games against Bradford City (W5 D4), though they’ve only kept one clean sheet across that time.
After winning the reverse fixture 2-1 in December, Bradford City will be looking to claim a first league double over Port Vale since the 2006-07 season.
Port Vale’s 1-0 defeat to Barrow ended a nine-game unbeaten run at home in League Two; they last suffered consecutive home defeats in the competition in May 2022.
